item.title: Nothing is change-able now?
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

[code/] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 500);
addItem(176, 50000);
sendMessage(“KramerScape Noob Pack”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why did you have to try…”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is trying to live with only one starter but he can’t.");

        }

[code/]
maybe try this

if (starter == 0) {

item.title: Nothing is change-able now?
item.dc:creator: @forest419 forest419
item.description:
@forest419 wrote:

Okay now, nothing will take effect even after i save and compile…

Say if I changed,

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 500);
sendMessage(“KramerScape Noob Pack”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why did you have to try…”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is trying to live with only one starter but he can’t.");

        }[/code]

To…

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 500);
addItem(176, 50000);
sendMessage(“KramerScape Noob Pack”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why did you have to try…”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is trying to live with only one starter but he can’t.");

        }[/code]

and save and compile, it wont work.
